00009 RandSobol::RandSobol( unsigned long Dimensionality, unsigned long Seed )
00010   : RandomBase2(Dimensionality), InitialSeed( Seed )

00020 void RandSobol::GetUniforms( SwArrays::MyArray& variates )
00021 {
00022   unsigned long dim = GetDimensionality();
00023   double* sobols = new double[dim];
00024   
00025   // Produces a vector of quasirandom numbers
00026   // Updates RunningSeed
00027   Sobol::i8_sobol( dim, &RunningSeed, sobols );
00028 
00029   // Move our array of floats into the vector
00030   for (unsigned long j=0; j<dim; j++)
00031     variates[j] = sobols[j];
00032 
00033   delete [] sobols;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void RandSobol::Skip( unsigned long numberOfPaths)
00037 {
00038   SwArrays::MyArray tmp( GetDimensionality() );
00039   for (unsigned long j=0; j<numberOfPaths; j++)
00040     GetUniforms(tmp);
00041 }
00042 
00043 void RandSobol::SetSeed( unsigned long Seed )
00044 {
00045   //InitialSeed = Seed;
00046   // Sobol sequence should start from 0
00047   InitialSeed = 0;
00048   RunningSeed = InitialSeed;
00049   srand48( Seed );
00050 }
00051 
00052 void RandSobol::Reset()
00053 {
00054   srand48( InitialSeed );
00055 }
